short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get inspirational quotes said by historical figures sent to you via notifications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the new Chrome Extension that will inspire you every day! Get ready to receive a dose of motivation from some of the greatest minds in history. With our inspirational quotes extension, you will receive daily notifications that feature timeless words of wisdom from famous figures such as Albert Einstein, Nelson Mandela, and Maya Angelou.

Imagine waking up to a motivational quote from Abraham Lincoln or starting your workday with a quote from Steve Jobs. Our extension will deliver inspiring messages to you at regular intervals throughout the day, helping you stay focused, energized, and motivated.
